text: Sopot is a small river in Poland. It originates near the Majdan Sopocki village and flows through Roztocze hills, passing through villages of Ciotusza Stara, Nowiny, Hamernia, and Osuchy. It is a tributary of Tanew. The river flows through the Polish Landscape Park of Puszcza Solska and the Czartowe Pole nature preserve. Category:Rivers of Poland Category:Rivers of Lublin Voivodeship
title: Sopot (river)
